page.title: 04Education in Radcliffe
page.content: Wesley Methodist Primary School is in Radcliffe,7 miles north of Manchester. 1986 is the centenary of the school.A new part of the school opened in 1973. School begins at 9.00 with assembly. Each day there are 4 or 5 lessons.The most important are Maths and English. Others inlude Topic, R.E., History, Geography, Craft, Sports, Music, Drama and Art.Each day at 10.35 we have a break when we go out to play.Break finishes at 10.50.Morning school finishes at 12.15.for lunch.We have a choice of school dinners, packed lunches or going home. Over 40% bring lunches and only a few go home. Afternoon school starts at 1.30 and ends at 3.30. Other activities take place after school.
